author: assaf
msg: Activity model now records a single action per activity and uses an action name.
HTML, Atom and iCal views combine multiple actions for the same person,
and translate action name into more readable form.
This allows other applications to investigate the task's activity stream and

author: assaf
msg: General task list now rendered using tasks.<format> views. Only inbox uses index.html.erb.

author: rdonkin
msg: Some additions to the script generator and some example mail with obscure MIME headers.
